open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: Vumatel Maintenance | Franklin Roosevelt Park
open.description: Vumatel is conducting maintenance in Franklin Roosevelt Park from Mon, Nov 24, 2025, 08:00 to Fri, Dec 12, 2025, 14:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Maintenance | Bothasig
open.description: Vumatel is conducting maintenance in Bothasig from Mon, Dec 8, 2025, 08:00 to Fri, Dec 12, 2025, 14:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Maintenance has overrun. Vumatel Technicians are still busy with maintenance related work. No ETR has been confirmed.

open.title: Vuma Core; Vuma Reach| Gauteng and Western Cape

closed.title: Octotel| Kensington, Blouberg, Melkbos, Ruyterwacht
closed.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Kensington, Blouberg, Melkbos, Ruyterwacht, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
closed.resolution: We are observing services for the Kensington, Blouberg, and Melkbos aggregation nodes have restored and are testing stable.

updates.content: Technicians are currently splicing fibres to restore connectivity. We are observing most of the affected customers connectivity have restored while some services still remain down.
Technicians were unsuccessful in localising the fault. The team is currently en route to float a new cable.

Technicians continue to work on localising the fault.

No ETR is available as yet

Technicians have identified a disconnect ~5.6km from site and are en route to localise.

No ETR is available as yet

closed.resolution:
Technicians have identified a disconnect ~5.6km from the site and are en route to localise.

updates.content: Technicians are onsite and conducting investigations.
Technicians are en route to site to investigate.
